A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just created a Rotten Tomatoes account just to thumbs down this abomination of a film. Can you give zero stars? I could only get it down to 1/2. I wouldn't trust Rian Johnson to make a box of macaroni and cheese. How much were those \"journalist\" reviewers paid to review this schlock favorably? Hey Disney\, I'll never give you another penny for your disrespectful treatment of this beloved franchise. It's actually very sad.
